languages.text: "Любовь моя, рядом с вами мой мир наполняется удивительным калейдоскопом красок". {n}Чарующая улыбка касается нежных губ.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Любовь моя, рядом с вами мой мир наполняется удивительным калейдоскопом красок". {n}Чарующая улыбка касается нехных губ.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “只要在你身边，我的世界就充满了万花筒般的色彩，我的爱人。”{n}她温柔的唇角露出了迷人的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “只要在你身边，我的世界就充满了万花筒般的色彩，我的爱人。”{n}她温柔的唇角露出了迷人的微笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}

languages.text: «Amor mío, estar a tu lado llena mi mundo de un caleidoscopio colorido». {n}Una sonrisa encantadora ocupa sus tiernos labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Amor mío, estar a tu lado llena mi mundo de un caleidoscopio colorido». {n}Una sonrisa encantadora ocupa sus tiernos labios.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「愛しい人、あなたのそばにいると、私の世界は素晴らしい万華鏡のような色彩で満たされるのです」{n}魅力的な微笑みが彼女の優しい唇に浮かぶ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「愛しい人、あなたのそばにいると、私の世界は素晴らしい万華鏡のような色彩で満たされるのです」{n}魅力的な微笑みが彼女の優しい唇に浮かぶ。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Herz, in Eurer Nähe zu sein, füllt meine Welt mit einem unglaublichen Kaleidoskop von Farben." {n}Ein charmantes Lächeln spielt um ihre zarten Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mein Herz, in Eurer Nähe zu sein, füllt meine Welt mit einem unglaublichen Kaleidoskop von Farben." {n}Ein charmantes Lächeln spielt um ihre zarten Lippen.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mon amour, être à vos côtés remplit mon monde de couleurs kaléidoscopiques, » {n}déclare Cassia avec un sourire charmant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My love, being near you fills my world with an amazing kaleidoscope of colours." {n}A charming smile touches her tender lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mon amour, être à vos côtés remplit mon monde de couleurs kaléidoscopiques, » {n}déclare Cassia avec un sourire charmant.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Aşkım, yanında oldukça tüm dünyam muhteşem ve rengârenk bir kaleydoskoba dönüşüyor." {n}Cassia'nın yumuşak dudaklarında albenili bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n}
